description: A lightly spiced take on a classic Italian pasta dish.
name: Spaghetti with Garlic, Chilli & Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and diced
200g button mushrooms, washed, drained and sliced
1 medium carrot, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up the canola oil in a large pot to a medium heat with the plant based mince and fry while tossing for 10 minutes.
Add the onion, garlic, carrot and mushrooms to the pot and fry for a further 6 minutes.
Cook the pasta in salted water as per packet instructions.
Add the rest of the ingredients to the pot apart from the basil, salt and pepper.
Allow the pot to simmer for 10 minutes for the sauce to reduce.
Remove the pasta from the pot and drain. Serve with the bolognese, garnish with basil and season to taste.
